name: MadridTransport

”incoming buses at 70”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: madrid transport
des:
Gives you real time information of Madrid's public transport by using EMT Open Data APIs.

Get estimated arrival time for bus stop lines with Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
